ParameterFields.Name: Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
Blue Beamos always fire at a specific spot.
Red Beamos track the player with their laser.
Laser Barriers fire a laser along a path to block the player.

ParameterFields.Name: Sight Range (Hundreds)
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This number multiplied by 100 and added to 500 is the range within it will notice the player and start firing a laser.

ParameterFields.Name: Deactivation Switch
ParameterFields.ToolTip: It will stop firing a laser once this switch is set.

ParameterFields.Name: Head Rotation Speed
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The speed the Red Beamos rotates its head at.

ParameterFields.Name: Behavior Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
"Only fires if Servant present" types won't start firing their laser unless a Servant of the Tower is in the room.
"Lasers are not solid" types fire lasers that don't have solid collision - they still damage the player and knock them back, but the player can walk through the lasers with iframes.

ParameterFields.Name: Laser Path
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
The path for the laser to go along.
If this is not set, this will only be half of a laser barrier, and it won't follow any path.
